jishoData.meaning: congeal, freeze, stiff, be absorbed in

onyomiExamples.meaning: condensation (of ideas, emotions, etc.), condensation (of a vapour or gas)

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to become stiff (of muscles), to get absorbed in, to develop a passion for, to devote oneself to, to become obsessed with, to get hooked on, to be elaborate, to be intricate, to be exquisite, to be particular about, to pay great attention to
to concentrate, to focus on, to devote, to apply oneself, to stiffen, to become tense
to freeze, to congeal, to concentrate one's attention on, to devote oneself to something, to ponder, to meditate
to congeal, to gelatinize, to jellify, to jell, to gell, to freeze
